name: MyHabit
0:
”Alexa ask my habit to add exercising daily”
”ask my habit i want to quit smoking”
”ask my habit what is my habit”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my habit
des:
Keep track of how long have you continued a particular habit.
Be it exercising daily, quit smoking, gymming, flossing, quit facebook.

You can keep track of how long it has been since you have continued your habit.
Simply say:
1. Alexa ask my habit to add exercising daily.
2. Alexa ask my habit i want to quit smoking.

And then you can ask:
1. Alexa ask my habit what is my streak.
2. Alexa ask my habit what is my habit
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
